Henji arigato, M-sama !!!
  Sokka ? 'Moeyo Ken" no eigo version ga naika... (inta-netto kara moratta mono.. he he)
   
  Sou desune. Tashika ni Vol. 2 ( ge no hou ) ni kaitearun desukedo, sou iu nagakute, sokkuri na serifu wa ,,eeto,, nainaa...
  ( or maybe its just the kotoba changes into english translation... kana.. )
   
  Kedo, arigatoune..
  Hontou ni tasukatta..
  Mata nanka attara, shitsumon sasete itadakimasu.
   
  Rei

"--- M." <patriot014@...> wrote:
          It's the one he says during the Boshin-sensou, right? Something like "I know 
I'm not going to win. The Tokugawa shogunate is going down, and it'd be a 
shame if no one were to go down with it." My guess would be that it would be 
in volume 2 of the Japanese version. Sorry I can't help you more than that. 
Watashi mo sono shosetsu wo motteirun desuga, ima wa hikkoshi-chuu dakara, 
kyuu ni hako ni hatteimasu. Gomen nasai.

To my knowledge, "Moeyo Ken" does not exist in English, though I have 
translated passages from its first chapter here and there.

-M.

>From: rei shinoda <shinoda_rei_goku@...>

>
>Mina sama, konnichiwa !!!
>
> I've never read english version of "Moeyo Ken", so is there anyone who 
>could tell me in what page Hijikata Toshizou words "I'm not going to battle 
>to win .......... That is what I must go. I will fight the best battle of 
>my life ..." was written at ??
> ( Nihongo no shousetsu motterun desuga, sono Hijikata no serifu wa doko 
>ni kaite attakke ? Jou - ge aru deshou ? Tashika ge no bun ni kaitearu 
>darou ? Moshi nihongo no bun wo motteru hito ga itara, oshiete 
>kudasaimasenka ? )
>
> Arigatou gozaimasu...
> Kore karamo yoroshiku onegai itashimasune !!!
>
> Ja, henji matteruyo.
>
> Rei
